name: Welcome to the Machine
text:
Green love coded the spectra/ We consider -

/ Ran its shades/ From r-hex to g to b./ Made displays fill/ The black screen/ Quicker than blinks,/ Softer than joy./ But more visceral,/ But less real.

/ You can’t imagine Spanish/ Tiled rooftops/ Until you’ve seen them/ In this illumination.

/ Ninety degrees never/ Looked so good -/ Nested in parallax,/ Rounded in close-cut/ Shadows.
